data.name: Collapse Storm
data.desc: The concentration of Collapse particles in this area is rapidly increasing, which usually means a Collapse storm is happening, and it doesn't seem to be stopping anytime soon. Dolls caught in a Collapse storm will lose HP quickly, so bounty hunters need to time their missions well and not linger too long.

data.name: High-Risk Area
data.desc: The system has raised the crisis level. Enemies in some areas are now more aggressive and most of them will attack bounty hunters who come to explore these regions.
